chipmunk.unlimited.feedback.stats

Class StatisticsAdapter

  • java.lang.Object
    • BaseAdapter
      • chipmunk.unlimited.feedback.stats.StatisticsAdapter
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    WebAPI.GetCourseVotesCallback

    public class StatisticsAdapter
extends BaseAdapter
implements WebAPI.GetCourseVotesCallback
    The adapter retrieves all subscribed courses from the database, and displays them in the list view. The adapter retrieves the votes for the courses, and updates the list view when the votes arrive.
